summary:
A highly meticulous and conscientious worker, with significant experience on the posts undertaken up to date. Important communication skills developed due to the nature of the working environments.
Trained to work under a continual status of pressure, and also becoming able to produce significant amounts of work in a limited time period.
A good team member and always willing to help other people become effective members of the team.

message.text:
I am immensely grateful for the unparalleled dedication and expertise of my leadership nursing team at The Heights of Alamo. Your tireless efforts and exceptional skills truly elevate our facility and everyone in it. Each day, you inspire and drive us forward.
 
A heartfelt thank you to Perla, our RNAC, who ensures our standards are nothing short of excellence. To Anna, our Director of Medical Records, whose meticulous attention to detail keeps us precise and informed. To Anabel, our Director of Clinical Education, for fostering an environment of learning and growth. And to Monica, our Director of Nursing Services, whose leadership is both aspirational and grounding.

One of the most uplifting parts of my day is seeing your smiles – it feels me with happiness and serves as a vivid reminder of the positive impact you each have on our workplace and community.
 
Your contributions are indispensable, and I am endlessly appreciative of all that you do. 

#Leadership #NursingExcellence #ThankYou

🌟Celebrating Success at The Heights of Alamo! 🌟

As the administrator of The Heights of Alamo,  I am thrilled to announce our exceptional regulatory outcomes over the past year! Despite facing challenges, our dedicated team has worked tirelessly to ensure the highest standards of care for our residents.

In 2021, we encountered a single deficiency, but we didn't let it deter us. With unwavering commitment and teamwork, our next survey was deficiency-free! And I'm proud to share that this week, we've achieved yet another deficiency-free survey.

I want to extend my heartfelt gratitude to our incredible team whose hard work and dedication have made this achievement possible. Together, we've demonstrated our commitment to excellence in every aspect of our operations.

Of course, we couldn't have accomplished this without the support and feedback from our amazing residents, patients and Veterans whose satisfaction and well-being are at the heart of everything we do.

While we remain vigilant of potential challenges, I am confident that with this remarkable team, we will continue to surpass expectations and provide the highest quality of care.

Thank you to everyone who has contributed to this success story. Here's to many more milestones ahead!

#HealthcareExcellence #TeamWork #RegulatoryOutcomes #TheHeightsOfAlamo #HealthSurvey #SuccessStory #Gratitude 🏥💼🌟

Did you know that National Peanut Butter and Jelly Day is April 2nd? 😳 Our team members enjoyed a tasty snack for breakfast on this day. Nothing best than a peanut butter and jelly sandwich to start off the morning with good energy ⚡️💙

#theheightsofalamo #alamotx #PeanutButterAndJelly

commentary.text: Hari Namboodiri Thank you, Hari, you are exactly right, team work is dream work 👏🏻 I learned many things from your leadership 🙏
Christine Cox-Aubin Thank you 🙏 appreciate it.
Monica Castaneda, MBA, LNFA thank you, Monica 🙏
Romeo Guerrero haha, stop by! We always have plenty for all family and visitors! 🥪
Garrett L. Hello Garrett, thank you 🙏
Mayra G Boyd Thank you Mayra! 🩷
